JobFullDesc: About the Role At Uber, providing world-class support riders, drivers, eaters and merchants is critical to our success. Building the capability of our support teams to consistently deliver elevated levels of service is challenging and complex - and incredibly satisfying!  We are looking for a Learning Experience Designer who can support design for multiple learning environments, US&C and/or lines of business (Eats, Rides, Safety, Greenlights, Transit) for US&C. This multifaceted role requires systematic planning & organization, creativity and proficiency in adult learning, storytelling, and UX Learning Design to execute on complex and multiple regional and global design projects along with leading a team of learning experience designers and design specialists. Basic Qualifications 7 years of experience in learning & development with a minimum of 4 years of experience in design and development of learning programs2 years of people management experienceFormal knowledge of instructional design and curriculum managementKnowledge of and practical application of Adult Learning Theory and instructional design principles.Experience working in an agile (SAM) and/or waterfall (ADDIE) design environment.Strong project management, organization skills and work independently to achieve design target timelines under conditions of multiple deadlines and changing priorities.Excellent written and oral communication skills. A flair for writing -- concise and structured. Ability to write effective copy, instructional text, audio scripts/video scripts.Data-driven decision and sound business judgment through strong logic & creative thinking and strong problem-solving ability.Experience in L&D for Customer Support, working in cross-cultural environments.Preferred QualificationsBackground/Experience in Camtasia, Vyond, Figma, Canva, etc.Experience in UX and visual/graphic design.Skilled in at least 2 tiers of the Adobe Creative Cloud, SCORM and HTML5.
